name: RoughTrain
description:
View our entry on Ludum Dare 49

RUST. DUST. RIDE. FAST.

Synopsis

Special Operation Group trying to steal the Artifact from the secret enemy lab.
But falls into a trap that activates nuclear anomaly.
You are the last survivor of the Group.
The only chance for salvation is an armored train.
But there is one catch — it falls apart right on the go.
Make this thing do its job and get out of this mess alive!

Game control

  • Walk - [W] [A] [S] [D]
  • Run - Hold [Shif]
  • Interact - [E]

Patch Note

  • v1.2 — fixed some sound issues and text overlay
  • v1.3 — fixed sound volume and other minor bugs
  • v1.4 — added subtitles

  • Anastasiya “anniki” Nikitenko — Artist
  • Anastasiya “onoiume” Ilina — Artis
